data.event: The town was incorporated in October 1734.
The population grew to 767 by 1800, but declined thereafter.

event.title: was born in Union on October 24, 1813

data.event: Alonzo Horton, considered the second founder of the city of San Diego, California, and the founder of Hortonville, Wisconsin, was born in Union on October 24, 1813.

event.title: moved away from the area in 1815

data.event: His family moved away from the area in 1815.
